Include device information on error report
If enabled, the error report will include useful information about this device, e.g. manufacturer or the version of Android installed.

Dear PFA-Team, 


<Please describe your encountered problem as accurately as possible. Include any information on what you were doing, what happened, what content would have been shown, any special characters like &, â€¦ . The more information you provide, the more likely we are able to determine the cause of it.>
